This is an opportunity to save $500 while securing a high-quality item that matches your needs perfectly. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer
